title: Ghost in the Mask
description: Caina Amalas is a nightfighter of the Ghosts, the spies and assassins of the Emperor of Nighmar, and through cunning and valor she has cast down both proud lords and mighty sorcerers.But a power darker than any she has ever faced is awakening.When a mad assassin armed with a sorcerous blade rampages through the Emperor's capital, Caina must track the weapon to its origin, a ruined city blighted by the folly of sorcerers, a city that holds weapons far more potent than mere blades.Weapons that can resurrect an ancient empire of dark sorcery to enslave the world anew...
author: Jonathan Moeller
